title: Genetics: past, present and future (TEFC)
creator_credit: Rodger Jones, Open University and BBC-TV
brief_description: This film is concerned with the origin of the science of genetics and reconstructs some of the crucial experiments performed. It also shows how nowadays it is possible to produce entirely novel plants by manipulations that avoid sexual hybridisation. Introduced by Jonathon Hodge.
